info.author: Alexandre Flamant
info.description:
==========
TensegriPy
==========

TensegriPy is a module containing non-linear method to solve 3D truss.
This module is meant to be used with COMPAS inside grasshopper for
the design, computation and optimization of tensegrity structures.

The software is under MIT License


Features
--------

Linear solver

Non-linear solver

Optimisation tools
info.name: tensegripy
info.summary: Tools for designing and solving 3D truss

========== TensegriPy

TensegriPy is a module containing non-linear method to solve 3D truss. This module is meant to be used with COMPAS inside grasshopper for the design, computation and optimization of tensegrity structures.

The software is under MIT License

Features
